title: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal Muffins
description: Cozy muffins with apples and warming spices.
instructions: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately then combine.
Spoon into muffin tin and bake 15–18 minutes.

title: Lemon Herb Roast Chicken
description: A simple, roast chicken with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season chicken and roast 1 hour until juices run clear.

title: Simple Chocolate Brownies
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter, whisk in sugar and eggs, fold in flour.
Pour in pan and bake 20–25 minutes.

title: Taiwanese Scallion Pancakes
description: Extra-crispy, flaky scallion pancakes — pan-fried flatbreads layered with scallions and oil.
instructions: Mix the flour and salt in a bowl. Gradually add warm water and mix until a rough dough forms.
Knead the dough on a lightly floured surface 5–8 minutes until smooth. Cover and let rest 20–30 minutes.
Divide the dough into 4 equal pieces. Roll one piece into a thin rectangle.
Brush a thin layer of oil over the dough, sprinkle with chopped scallions, then roll up tightly into a log and coil it into a round. Flatten gently and roll into a thin pancake.
Heat a thin layer of vegetable oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Fry each pancake until golden and crisp on both sides, about 2–3 minutes per side. Press gently while frying for even contact.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot, torn into wedges or whole with soy dipping sauce.
